title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Architecting large-scale migrations with Fannie Mae and the NRO (WPS201)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 与房利美和 NRO 一起构建大规模迁移架构 (WPS201)
abstract: What does it take to migrate some of the largest, most complex enterprise and federal workloads to the cloud without disrupting mission operations or compromising security? In this session, discover how the National Reconnaissance Office and Fannie Mae architected and executed mission-scale migrations to AWS. You will learn strategies for designing secure, resilient, and cost-efficient architectures; approaches to maintaining continuity of operations during complex cutovers; and how to lay a cloud-native foundation that enables modernization and emerging technologies like generative AI. Walk away with practical insights you can apply to your own migration and transformation initiatives.
abstract_cn: 将一些最大、最复杂的企业和联邦工作负载迁移到云端而不中断任务运营或损害安全性需要什么？在本次会议中，了解国家侦察办公室和房利美如何架构和执行任务规模的 AWS 迁移。您将学习设计安全、弹性和成本效益架构的策略；在复杂切换期间维持运营连续性的方法；以及如何奠定云原生基础，实现现代化和生成式 AI 等新兴技术。带走可应用于您自己的迁移和转型计划的实用见解。
